TopicTitle: Today in 1959 - Luna 1 misses the Moon

Articles.Content:
02-JAN-1959, the Soviet Luna 1 impactor missed the Moon and inadvertently became the first spacecraft to go into solar orbit.

Sounds like my first time at KSP too... They shoulda used MechJeb!
Far as I remember they turned it into a triumph - the Soviet news on that day read "The first solar satellite"!

Far as I remember they turned it into a triumph - the Soviet news on that day read "The first solar satellite"!

You have to applaud them, always thinking on the bright side
